Example 1 CountUnique(user by ip) ip user CountUnique(user by ip) 1.1.1.1 anna 1 2.2.2.2 brad 1 1.1.1.1 cela 2 1.1.1.1 anna 2 Try in Sandbox Example 2 Count(user by ip where ip.Contains('1')) ip user Count(user by ip where ip.Contains('1')) 1.1.1.1 anna 1 2.2.2.2 brad 0 1.1.1.1 cela 2 1.1.1.1 anna 3 Try in Sandbox
